title: WTT for T206 Hindu (Brown) 3 Finger Brown
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: WTT for T206 Hindu (Brown) 3 Finger Brown
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I am looking to trade into a 3 Finger Brown with a Hindu back.  I would like to have a nice clean card around VG.  It can be lower as long as it presents well.  Either pose is fine with me.  I would like to match it up with my Tinker, Evers, Chance trio of tougher backs.
Trade, or cash and trade is doable.  If the Lenox CHI Shirt is around, I would like to see it, but may be out of range, but would be happy to work on something.
Let me see what you all have.  Thanks for the time,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
just replying to I would like to see it.

for some reason I could not post the scans together

Jim,
I thought there might be a chance you would be holding at least one of the three options.
Great cards, thanks for taking the time to share,
Bob
